summary: contains new texture new mesh and of course its smithable  can play with both ravengers as they count as different mods lore friendly also
descriptionHtml:
Description
this is my mod it adds a weapon called the blue ravenger no i did not mispelled it its lorefriendly smithable and looks awesome its is its own weapon so dont worry about stuff being replaced the sword is a two hander and is slightly bigger than the ebony greatsword and does more damage and crit dam but its also slower and balanced the weapon is also upgradeable .

smithing 
level 80
6 ebony ingots,4 leather strips, 3 malachite ingot
upgrade with
1 malachite ingot

install
drop to your skyrim data folder

credits
falloutfan44 of course because i made it all
author: falloutfan44
